title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

On June 12, 1980, The New York Post quoted John Anderson as saying, “I'm not going to stand up and genuflect to the Ayatollah Khomeini.” [Submitted by Martin Meyers, New York City.]
